meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marisa Tam Mary Keating Roger Craig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5981.

td.p: Marisa Tam, an archives assistant from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Mary Keating, a lawyer from Baltimore, Maryland
Roger Craig, a graduate student of computer science from Newark, Delaware (whose 5-day cash winnings total $195,801)

tr.td: LESSER-KNOWN AMERICANS
COUNTRY MUSIC
THE LOYOLA OPPOSITION
YOUR HONOR, I OBJECT!
GOOD CAUSES
BLARNEY

RogerMarisa

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_1', 'clue_DJ_2_1_stuck', '(Roger: What is Los Angeles?)
...

L.A.

Roger
Triple Stumper
')

Mary
Triple Stumper
')

Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Mary\'s response] Oh, picked the wrong one; the Bahamas are independent now.)
MarisaWhat are the British Virgin Islands?
$5,000
MaryWhat are the Bahamas?
$18,000
RogerWhat is Falklands?
$801
Bermuda')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
